程序包 ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

类 Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    The Navigation class is used to make the robot navigate around the playing field.

    • 方法概要

      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static void avoid()
      aovid the obstacle
      static void avoidTravel​(double ultrasonicDistance, Point destination)
      if there is an obstacle on the path, design an available path
      static int convertAngle​(double angle)
      Converts input angle to the total rotation of each wheel needed to rotate the robot by that angle.
      static int convertDistance​(double distance)
      Converts input distance to the total rotation of each wheel needed to cover that distance.
      static void decideTravelTo​(Point destination)  
      static void directTravelTo​(Point destination)
      Travels directly (in a straight line) to the given destination.
      static void directTravelTo2​(Point destination)
      direct travel to a point without localizing at the end
      static double distanceBetween​(Point p1, Point p2)
      Returns the distance between the two points in tile lengths (feet).
      static double getDestinationAngle​(Point current, Point destination)
      Returns the angle that the robot should point towards to face the destination in degrees.
      static void localizeToPoint​(double angleDestPointTo)
      This method localize the robot to its nearest point.
      static double minimalAngle​(double initialAngle, double destAngle)
      Returns the signed minimal angle in degrees from initial angle to destination angle (deg).
      static void moveStraightFor​(double distance)
      Moves the robot straight for the given distance.
      static void setSpeed​(int speed)
      Sets the speed of both motors to the same values.
      static void setSpeeds​(int leftSpeed, int rightSpeed)
      Sets the speed of both motors to different values.
      static void travelTo​(Point destination)
      Travels to destination taking obstacles into account.
      static void turnBy​(double angle)
      Turns the robot by a specified angle.
      static void turnTo​(double angle)
      Turns the robot with a minimal angle towards the given input angle in degrees, no matter what its current orientation is.

    • 方法详细资料

      • travelTo

        public static void travelTo​(Point destination)
        Travels to destination taking obstacles into account.

        TODO Describe your algorithm here in detail (then remove these instructions).

      • directTravelTo

        public static void directTravelTo​(Point destination)
        Travels directly (in a straight line) to the given destination. Finally a light localization will used to make the travel more accurate.
        参数:
        destination - destination point

      • turnTo

        public static void turnTo​(double angle)
        Turns the robot with a minimal angle towards the given input angle in degrees, no matter what its current orientation is. This method is different from turnBy().

      • getDestinationAngle

        public static double getDestinationAngle​(Point current,
                                         Point destination)
        Returns the angle that the robot should point towards to face the destination in degrees. This function does not depend on the robot's current theta.

      • minimalAngle

        public static double minimalAngle​(double initialAngle,
                                  double destAngle)
        Returns the signed minimal angle in degrees from initial angle to destination angle (deg).
        参数:
        initialAngle - initial angle
        destAngle - final angle
        返回:

      • distanceBetween

        public static double distanceBetween​(Point p1,
                                     Point p2)
        Returns the distance between the two points in tile lengths (feet).
        参数:
        p1 - first point
        p2 - second point
        返回:

      • moveStraightFor

        public static void moveStraightFor​(double distance)
        Moves the robot straight for the given distance.
        参数:
        distance - in feet (tile sizes), may be negative

      • turnBy

        public static void turnBy​(double angle)
        Turns the robot by a specified angle. Note that this method is different from Navigation.turnTo(). For example, if the robot is facing 90 degrees, calling turnBy(90) will make the robot turn to 180 degrees, but calling Navigation.turnTo(90) should do nothing (since the robot is already at 90 degrees).
        参数:
        angle - the angle by which to turn, in degrees

      • convertAngle

        public static int convertAngle​(double angle)
        Converts input angle to the total rotation of each wheel needed to rotate the robot by that angle.
        参数:
        angle - the input angle in degrees
        返回:
        the wheel rotations necessary to rotate the robot by the angle in degrees

      • convertDistance

        public static int convertDistance​(double distance)
        Converts input distance to the total rotation of each wheel needed to cover that distance.
        参数:
        distance - the input distance in meters
        返回:
        the wheel rotations necessary to cover the distance in degrees

      • setSpeeds

        public static void setSpeeds​(int leftSpeed,
                             int rightSpeed)
        Sets the speed of both motors to different values.
        参数:
        leftSpeed - the speed of the left motor in degrees per second
        rightSpeed - the speed of the right motor in degrees per second

      • setSpeed

        public static void setSpeed​(int speed)
        Sets the speed of both motors to the same values.
        参数:
        speed - the speed in degrees per second

      • localizeToPoint

        public static void localizeToPoint​(double angleDestPointTo)
        This method localize the robot to its nearest point.
        参数:
        angleDestPointTo - The angle the robot should point toward to to get the destination

      • avoidTravel

        public static void avoidTravel​(double ultrasonicDistance,
                               Point destination)
        if there is an obstacle on the path, design an available path
        参数:
        ultrasonicDistance - obstacle distance
        destination - end point

      • avoid

        public static void avoid()
        aovid the obstacle

      • decideTravelTo

        public static void decideTravelTo​(Point destination)

      • directTravelTo2

        public static void directTravelTo2​(Point destination)
        direct travel to a point without localizing at the end
        参数:
        destination - destination point
